edu.biu.protocols.yao.primitives

Class CircuitInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.protocols.yao.primitives.CircuitInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProtocolInput, java.io.Serializable

    public class CircuitInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProtocolInput, java.io.Serializable
    This class Manages the input of the circuit.

    It contains the wires' indices the input bytes for each wire index.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Asaf Cohen)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      A constructor that sets the given input for the given wires.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CircuitInput

        public CircuitInput(byte[] inputBits,
            int[] wireLabels)
        A constructor that sets the given input for the given wires.
        Parameters:
        inputBits - The input for each wire.
        wireLabels - The indices of the wires.

    • Method Detail

      • fromByteArray

        public static CircuitInput fromByteArray(byte[] inputArray)
        Alternative constructor.

        It creates new CircuitInput object with the given input and a new wire indices array such as the indices are [0, ..., input.length].

        Parameters:
        inputArray - The input for each wire.
        Returns:
        the created CircuitInput object.

      • fromFile

        public static CircuitInput fromFile(java.lang.String filename,
                    BooleanCircuit bc,
                    int party)
                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Alternative constructor.

        It creates new CircuitInput object and read the input from the given file.

        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file to read the inputs from.
        bc - The circuit to get the inputs for.
        party - the party number which the inputs belongs.
        Returns:
        the created CircuitInput object.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • randomInput

        public static CircuitInput randomInput(int[] labels)
        Alternative constructor.

        It creates new CircuitInput object and sets random inputs.

        Parameters:
        labels - The indices of the wires.
        Returns:
        the created CircuitInput object.

      • fromSecretKey

        public static CircuitInput fromSecretKey(javax.crypto.SecretKey inputKey)
        Alternative constructor.

        It creates new CircuitInput object and sets the inputs from the given key.

        Parameters:
        inputKey - The key that used to get the inputs.
        Returns:
        the created CircuitInput object.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the size of the inputs.

      • getNthBit

        public byte getNthBit(int n)
        Returns the N'th input bit.
        Parameters:
        n - the index of the wire to get the input of.

      • getInputWires

      • xor

        public static byte[] xor(CircuitInput x1,
         CircuitInput x2)
        Returns the xor of the inputs in the two given CircuitInputs objects.
        Parameters:
        x1 - The first input to xor with the other.
        x2 - The second input to xor with the other.
        Returns:
        the xor result.
